title: 155. Q&AF: How To Silence "Haters," Separating Business And Personal & Hiring People With Shady Past
itunes:title: 155. Q&AF: How To Silence "Haters," Separating Business And Personal & Hiring People With Shady Past
description: When you're doing big shit, they're supposed to hate. On today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how you can silence the people that don't believe in your vision, how to keep business and personal life separated and how to make a judgment call on hiring someone with a shady past.
